name: QA engineer - BPAD
description:
Business Planning and Development (BPAD) is a global strategic function providing insight and analysis for Corporate Finance management. BPAD's mission is to create the framework, tools, analysis and process necessary to drive tactics and strategy for Corporate Finance in total and by region.

The analyses created by the team are in part based on a global fee model using Dealogic and Mercer Oliver Wyman data. This fee pool information is then combined with a variety of internal and external data sources to gain an overall understanding of coverage, client and product metrics.

BPAD is responsible for ensuring that management and Corporate Finance coverage leaders receive the most accurate and insightful analysis upon which to base their business decisions. BPAD looks at the performance of the Deutsche Bank franchise and Corporate Finance across debt, equity and advisory products.

Core activities include:

· Monthly/quarterly Corporate Finance market analysis based using information from external data. (Dealogic, ThomsonReuters)

· Competitor reviews. Recent studies include UBS, Merrill Lynch and JPMorgan.

· Upside analysis, formulating views on future fee pool direction and sizing Corporate Finance opportunities.

· Client review analysis, client wallet sizing and client planning.

· Client relationship management and client coverage support.

These core analyses and activities are constantly developed to understand key trends in the market in order to identify opportunities and threats.

What you will do

As part of our global team you will work on test automation for various application components as a QA engineer.

You are expected to contribute to the vision, implement modern software testing solution, understand our product roadmap, integrate business value with experience and contribute to building an engineering culture within the team.

We expect the successful candidate to deliver high quality test automation solutions, and to be passionate about software engineering.

Your role includes

· Active collaboration with Dev team and stakeholders to ensure successful delivery

· Test Strategy/Test Plan ownership

· Automation testing framework maintenance and development

· Identify and drive constant process improvements in QA area

· Coordinate front to back testing activities

Required skills

· 2+ years of experience as auto QA

· Knowledge of core Java, Junit

· Basic SQL knowledge

· Good testing experience across software development lifecycle

· Experience in using automated testing and automated tests development

· Experience in test case and test plan development

· Excellent analytical and problem solving skills

· Good communication skills, intermediate English

Will be a plus

· Experience with Selenium

· Experience of automated performance testing

· Knowledge of basic Unix/Linux commands

· Knowledge of release management and change control procedures

What we offer

  • Flexible working hours
  • Partially remote work
  • Comfortable office located in the city center
  • Extended insurance package: medical and life insurance + partial coverage for spouse and children
  • Plenty of professional learning opportunities: English courses, professional trainings and certification, conferences participation
  • Relocation package (for new-joiners from other locations)
